intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: At Insight AI, we take our users‚Äô privacy seriously. This policy explains what data we collect and how it is used.

error.quotaExceeded: You‚Äôve used all your analysis quota for today.
error.rateLimit: The system is currently overloaded. Please try again later.
error.invalidCode: The verification code is invalid or expired.
error.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before logging in.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.analysisNotFound: The requested analysis could not be found.
error.alreadyFavorited: This analysis is already in your favorites.
error.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again.
error.noTweets: No tweets found for this user.
error.twitterCallbackFailed: Could not retrieve access from Twitter.
error.twitterUserSaveFailed: An error occurred while saving the Twitter user.
error.pdfGenerationFailed: An error occurred while generating the PDF.
error.fetchHistoryFailed: Failed to load your analysis history. Please refresh the page.
error.adminRequired: Admin privileges are required to perform this action.
error.noToken: You must be logged in to perform this action.
error.invalidToken: Your session might have expired. Please log in again.
error.locationFailed: Language could not be set. Defaulting to English.
error.userExists: This email address is already registered.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We only fetch your Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn posts for the purpose of analysis. We do not access your personal account credentials.

useOfData.title: 3. Use of Data
useOfData.text: Collected data is used to generate character analysis PDFs and improve our service quality. We never share it with third parties.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.text: We use technical cookies for session management and UX enhancement. No personally identifying cookies are used.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.text: For questions about this policy, reach us at support@insightai.com.

intro.title: 1. Acceptance
intro.text: By using this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms.

license.title: 2. License
license.text: You are granted a limited, non-transferable, revocable license to use the service for personal purposes only.

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The service is provided "as is." No guarantees are made regarding uninterrupted or error-free operation.

limitations.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitations.text: Under no circumstances shall we be liable for indirect damages such as data loss or lost profits.

law.title: 5. Governing Law
law.text: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey, and any disputes will be handled by Istanbul courts.
